name: Jaden's Platformer Project DEMO ver.0.0.1
description:
Current Features

  • 3 levels + tutorial stage
  • satisfying gameplay mechanics
  • curated sound design and pleasant graphics (currently using and modifying  pre-made assets, but will make my own in the future)

Planned for Next Version Release & Beyond:

  • BOSSES!
  • More enemies
  • More levels (think of story/adventure mode in any smash game)
  • More abilities as well as projectile weapons
  • Multiple player characters
  • Randomizer mode
  • Roguelike boss rush mode
  • RPG / Hack'n'Slash elements
  • Level Editor
  • New music, characters, and sprites designed specifically for this game.
  • note: this build of the game was made in a week. This is also my first game, feel free to comment constructive feedback so I can improve in the next version release. I really appreciate any support or critique. 
  • Feel free to follow my channel for future updates and projects:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCethNybnz2xTFIQYQnGog7A
